CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the photovoltaic properties of copolymers are measured using PC71BM as an electron acceptor , it is found that the optimum blend ratio of polymer : PC71BM is 1 : 2 to afford the best PCE of both copolymers with the conventional device architecture of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / Ca / Al ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| PC71BM |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| Ca |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| PC71BM |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| Ca |
| Al (cathode material) |

Note: "ITO/PEDOT : PSS" is considered as two separate material entities in this context.
